documentation.text: @title DerifyRewards - Process rewards of bond, edrf, position mining rewards, broker rewards.
@dev Create a new role identifier for the pauser role
@dev Create a new role identifier for the exchange role
@dev Create a new role identifier for the reward execute role
@dev The token contract decimals diff with contract decimals
@dev get the upper bound of available exchange bond size
@dev update bond when trader does actions
@dev update edrf when trader does actions

params.amount: The amount of position mining reward
The amount of derify bond to deposit to bank
The amount of derify bond to exchange

getExchangeBondSizeUpperBound(address).details: get the upper bound of available exchange bond size

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.trader: The address of trader to be paid

params.amount: The amount of derify bond to redeem
The amount of drf to redeem

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params.amount: The amount of drf to staking

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.traders: The traders to add position mining reward

EXCHANGE_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the exchange role

PAUSER_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the pauser role

REWARD_EXECUTE_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the reward execute role

TOKEN_DECIMAL_DIFF.details: The token contract decimals diff with contract decimals

devdoc.title: DerifyRewards - Process rewards of bond, edrf, position mining rewards, broker rewards.

BondUpdates(uint8,address,int256,uint256.notice: Emitted when bond balance updates for user

ContractParamsUpdate(address,address,add.notice: Emitted when params of contract updates

DrfBalanceUpdate(uint8,address,int256,ui.notice: Emitted when DRF balance updates for user

EdrfBalanceUpdate(uint8,address,int256,u.notice: Emitted when eDRF balance updates for user

PositionRewardUpdates(uint8,address,int2.notice: Emitted when Position Mining Reward updates for user

addPositionReward(address,uint256).notice: Add position mining reward by trading fee

claimDrfPmr().notice: Claim position mining reward of drf from CommunityVestingVault

drfPmrPool().notice: Get Position Mining Reward DRF Pool value

getStakingInfo(address).notice: Get trader's DRF balance and eDRF balance

unitStakingNumber().notice: Get unitStakingNumber, the unit staking number per block drf=>edrf

updateTradersPositionReward(address[],ui.notice: Update traders' position mining reward by system

usdPmrPool().notice: Get Position Mining Reward USD Pool value

withdrawAllBond().notice: Withdraw all derify bond of trader

withdrawPositionReward().notice: Withdraw position mining reward by trader
